title: Organizational Innovation Strategy Through Industrial Clusters, Trust, and Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Organizational Management and Strategic Planning
context.additional_context: A large-scale training program for managers/leaders conducted in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment.

learning_goals: Trust-building mechanisms within industrial clusters can be analyzed to design inter-organizational collaboration strategies.
A cluster-based learning framework can be constructed by applying literature review methodologies.
A conceptual model can be developed to assess the impact of trust and learning on corporate performance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
